-- Migration: Forum enhancements - Female-specific, Grooming & Hygiene, Photography
-- Date: 2025-12-26
-- Description: Adds female-specific category, grooming/hygiene, and photography forums

-- ============== STEP 1: Add Female-Specific Category ==============
INSERT INTO forum_issue_categories (name, slug, description, icon, display_order) VALUES
    ('Female-Specific', 'female', 'Women''s beauty, hormonal health, and feminine optimization', 'üë©', 6)
ON CONFLICT (slug) DO UPDATE SET
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    description = EXCLUDED.description,
    icon = EXCLUDED.icon,
    display_order = EXCLUDED.display_order;

-- Add Grooming & Hygiene category
INSERT INTO forum_issue_categories (name, slug, description, icon, display_order) VALUES
    ('Grooming & Hygiene', 'grooming-hygiene', 'Daily routines, oral care, and personal maintenance', 'üß¥', 7)
ON CONFLICT (slug) DO UPDATE SET
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    description = EXCLUDED.description,
    icon = EXCLUDED.icon,
    display_order = EXCLUDED.display_order;

-- ============== STEP 2: Add Female-Specific Sub-forums ==============
INSERT INTO forum_sub_forums (issue_category_id, name, slug, description, icon, display_order) VALUES
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='female'), 'Hormonal Health', 'hormonal', 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and hormone balance', 'üíä', 1),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='female'), 'Body Contouring', 'body-contouring', 'Gluteal augmentation, waist definition, and body shape', 'üçë', 2),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='female'), 'Anti-Aging', 'anti-aging', 'Preventive aging, skincare, and treatments', '‚ú®', 3),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='female'), 'Hair & Nails', 'hair-nails', 'Hair growth, extensions, and nail care', 'üíÖ', 4),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='female'), 'Facial Feminization', 'feminization', 'Soft features, lip fillers, and feminine aesthetics', 'üëÑ', 5),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='female'), 'Makeup & Lashes', 'makeup', 'Makeup techniques, lash extensions, and enhancement', 'üíÑ', 6)
ON CONFLICT (issue_category_id, slug) DO UPDATE SET
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    description = EXCLUDED.description,
    icon = EXCLUDED.icon;

-- ============== STEP 3: Add Grooming & Hygiene Sub-forums ==============
INSERT INTO forum_sub_forums (issue_category_id, name, slug, description, icon, display_order) VALUES
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='grooming-hygiene'), 'Daily Routine', 'daily-routine', 'Morning and evening routines, habits', 'üåÖ', 1),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='grooming-hygiene'), 'Oral Care', 'oral-care', 'Teeth whitening, breath, tongue scraping', 'ü¶∑', 2),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='grooming-hygiene'), 'Body Odor', 'body-odor', 'Deodorant, sweating, and scent', 'üßº', 3),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='grooming-hygiene'), 'Manscaping', 'manscaping', 'Body hair grooming and removal', '‚úÇÔ∏è', 4),
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='grooming-hygiene'), 'Eyebrows', 'eyebrows', 'Eyebrow shaping, microblading, and grooming', 'üëÅÔ∏è', 5)
ON CONFLICT (issue_category_id, slug) DO UPDATE SET
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    description = EXCLUDED.description,
    icon = EXCLUDED.icon;

-- ============== STEP 4: Rename Sub-forums for Clarity ==============

-- Update naming in Facial Structure for clarity
UPDATE forum_sub_forums
SET name = 'Mewing & Jawline', description = 'Mewing technique, jaw exercises, gonial angle, and jaw development'
WHERE slug = 'jawline' AND issue_category_id = (SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='facial-structure');

-- Update Skin & Hair naming
UPDATE forum_sub_forums
SET name = 'Beard Growth'
WHERE slug = 'beard' AND issue_category_id = (SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='skin-hair');

UPDATE forum_sub_forums
SET name = 'Hair Loss & Treatments'
WHERE slug = 'hairloss' AND issue_category_id = (SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='skin-hair');

-- Update Medical naming
UPDATE forum_sub_forums
SET name = 'Facial Fillers'
WHERE slug = 'fillers' AND issue_category_id = (SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='medical');

-- Update Lifestyle naming
UPDATE forum_sub_forums
SET name = 'Photo Optimization', description = 'Photography, angles, lighting, and looking good in photos'
WHERE slug = 'photogenic' AND issue_category_id = (SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='lifestyle-style');

UPDATE forum_sub_forums
SET name = 'Social Skills & Confidence'
WHERE slug = 'confidence' AND issue_category_id = (SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='lifestyle-style');

-- ============== STEP 5: Add Missing High-Priority Sub-forums ==============

-- Add Styling Strategies to Skin & Hair (for hair loss styling)
INSERT INTO forum_sub_forums (issue_category_id, name, slug, description, icon, display_order) VALUES
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='skin-hair'), 'Hair Styling', 'hair-styling', 'Hairstyles, cuts, and styling for thinning hair', 'üíá‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è', 7)
ON CONFLICT (issue_category_id, slug) DO UPDATE SET
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    description = EXCLUDED.description;

-- Add Posture & Breathing to Physique (already exists but ensure it's there)
INSERT INTO forum_sub_forums (issue_category_id, name, slug, description, icon, display_order) VALUES
    ((SELECT id FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE slug='physique-frame'), 'Posture & Breathing', 'posture-breathing', 'Posture correction, nasal breathing, and forward head posture', 'üßò', 8)
ON CONFLICT (issue_category_id, slug) DO UPDATE SET
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    description = EXCLUDED.description;

-- ============== VERIFY ==============
SELECT 'Total Active Categories' as info, COUNT(*) as count FROM forum_issue_categories WHERE is_active = TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Total Sub-forums', COUNT(*) FROM forum_sub_forums sf
JOIN forum_issue_categories c ON sf.issue_category_id = c.id WHERE c.is_active = TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Female-Specific Subs', COUNT(*) FROM forum_sub_forums sf
JOIN forum_issue_categories c ON sf.issue_category_id = c.id WHERE c.slug = 'female';

content.text:
Pushed to main. Vercel deployment triggered.

**Summary of what was done:**

1. **Applied migration 010** to Railway database:
   - 14 categories (2 new: Female-Specific, Grooming & Hygiene)
   - 54 sub-forums total
   - 6 female-specific subs (Hormonal, Body Contouring, Anti-Aging, Hair & Nails, Feminization, Makeup)
   - 5 grooming subs (Daily Routine, Oral Care, Body Odor, Manscaping, Eyebrows)
   - Fixed 2 failed inserts (wrong category slugs)

2. **Committed 76 files** with:
   - Forum auth fixes (VoteButtons, comment form)
   - 30+ new guides (blood markers, hormone optimization, training splits)
   - New components (HeroRoutineCard, StickyMobileCTA, ShopTab)
   - HTML nesting and chart sizing fixes

3. **Pushed to main** ‚Üí Vercel deployment in progress

You can monitor the deployment at https://vercel.com or test the forum at https://looksmaxx-app.vercel.app/forum once deployed.

Perfect! Now I have a comprehensive understanding. Let me create a detailed report of my findings:

## LOOKSMAXX Forum: Topic/Hashtag System Analysis

Based on my thorough exploration of the LOOKSMAXX codebase, here are my findings:

### Current Forum Structure

**NO dedicated topic/hashtag/tag system exists**. Instead, the forum uses a **two-level hierarchy**:

1. **Categories** (12 main issue categories) - e.g., "Weak Bone Structure", "Poor Skin", "Fashion"
2. **Sub-Forums** (44+ sub-forums) - e.g., "Jawline", "Skincare", "Training"

### Terminology Confusion: "Topics" Refers to Sub-Forums

In the UI, "topics" is used as a label for sub-forums:
- **File**: `looksmaxx-app/src/components/forum/CategoryCard.tsx:31`
  ```
  {category.postCount} posts ‚Ä¢ {category.subForums.length} topics
  ```

- **File**: `looksmaxx-app/src/components/forum/CreatePostForm.tsx:41`
  ```
  setError('Please select a topic');
  ```

This is cosmetic UI terminology - the actual database schema calls them `ForumSubForum`, not `Topic`.

### Database Schema Details

**Tables (from `/migrations/004_add_forum_tables.sql`):**
- `forum_issue_categories` - Main categories
- `forum_sub_forums` - Sub-forums (labeled "topics" in UI only)
- `forum_posts` - Posts within sub-forums
- `forum_comments` - Comments on posts
- `forum_votes` - Voting system
- `forum_reports` - Moderation reports
- `flaw_to_forum_mapping` - Maps detected flaws to relevant categories
- `ArchetypeForumMapping` - Maps archetypes to relevant forums

**No fields exist for:**
- Post-level tags
- Hashtags
- Topics table
- Topic associations

### Recent Restructuring (Migration 009)

The forum was recently restructured (2025-12-26) from a 12-category system to a **Reddit-style 6-category system**:

| Old Categories | New Categories |
|---|---|
| Body Composition, Weak Bone Structure, Poor Skin, Teeth/Smile, Weak Eyes, Height/Frame, Face Fat, Fashion, Hair Loss, Thin Lips, Anxiety, Social Media | General Discussion, Physique & Frame, Facial Structure, Skin & Hair, Medical & Procedures, Lifestyle & Style, Female-Specific (added in migration 010), Grooming & Hygiene (added in migration 010) |

### API Endpoints

No topic-specific endpoints exist. The forum API structure is:
- `GET /forum/categories` - List all categories with sub-forums
- `GET /forum/categories/{slug}` - Get single category
- `GET /forum/{categorySlug}/{subForumSlug}` - Get posts in sub-forum
- No endpoints for topics or hashtags

### Frontend Components

All forum components work with the `SubForum` type (not "Topic"):

**Files**:
- `src/types/forum.ts` - No Topic type, only `SubForum` interface
- `src/components/forum/CategoryCard.tsx` - Shows subForums count
- `src/components/forum/CreatePostForm.tsx` - Selects subForumId
- `src/app/forum/page.tsx` - Lists categories with sub-forums

### Conclusion

**There is NO topic/hashtag/tag system to remove.** The term "topics" is only used as UI labeling for sub-forums. If you want to:

1. **Add hashtags/tags to posts** - You would need to:
   - Add `post_tags` junction table
   - Add new API endpoints for tag search/filtering
   - Update post forms to accept tags

2. **Remove "topics" terminology** - Just update the UI text in:
   - `CategoryCard.tsx` line 31: Change "topics" to "sub-forums" or "communities"
   - `CreatePostForm.tsx` line 41: Change "Please select a topic" to "Please select a sub-forum"

3. **Current structure is working well** - The 2-level category ‚Üí sub-forum hierarchy provides clear organization without additional tagging complexity.

**Files to keep in mind:**
- Database models: `/looksmaxx-api/app/models/forum.py`
- Database schema: `/looksmaxx-api/migrations/004_add_forum_tables.sql` (and 009, 010)
- Frontend types: `/looksmaxx-app/src/types/forum.ts`
- Frontend components: `/looksmaxx-app/src/components/forum/*`

Let me compile my findings: ## LOOKSMAXX Forum Share, Save, and Report Features Analysis Based on my comprehensive exploration of the LOOKSMAXX codebase, here's my detailed analysis of the forum's share, save, and report functionality: --- ### 1. **SHARE FUNCTIONALITY** **Status:** ‚ùå **NOT IMPLEMENTED** (UI present, no backend wiring) **Components:** - **PostCard** (`src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx`, line 83-86): ```tsx ``` - **Post Detail Page** (`src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx`, line 227-230): ```tsx ``` **Issues:** - Button exists but is non-functional (`onClick` handler missing) - No API method for sharing (not in `api.ts`) - No context method in `ForumContext.tsx` - No share modal or menu for options (copy link, social share, etc.) - Uses `Share2` icon from lucide-react but no implementation --- ### 2. **SAVE/BOOKMARK FUNCTIONALITY** **Status:** ‚ùå **NOT IMPLEMENTED** (UI present, no backend wiring) **Components:** - **PostCard** (`src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx`, line 87-90): ```tsx ``` - **Post Detail Page** (`src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx`, line 231-234): ```tsx ``` **Issues:** - Button exists but is non-functional (`onClick` handler missing) - No API method for saving/bookmarking (not in `api.ts`) - No context method in `ForumContext.tsx` - No saved posts list or collection page - No visual indication of saved/bookmarked status - Uses `Bookmark` icon but no state tracking **Missing Backend Support:** - No `ForumSave` or `ForumBookmark` database model - No `/forum/saves` or `/forum/bookmarks` endpoints - No save/unsave methods in API client --- ### 3. **REPORT FUNCTIONALITY** **Status:** ‚úÖ **PARTIALLY IMPLEMENTED** (Backend exists, frontend UI incomplete) **Components:** #### Frontend UI: - **Post Detail Page** (`src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx`, line 235-238): ```tsx ``` - Uses `Flag` icon from lucide-react - Button is non-functional (no `onClick` handler) #### API Method Exists: Located in `src/lib/api.ts` (lines 748-760): ```typescript async createForumReport(data: ReportCreate): Promise { const response = await this.request('/forum/reports', { method: 'POST', body: { target_type: data.targetType, target_id: data.targetId, reason: data.reason, details: data.details, }, }); return transformReport(response); } ``` #### Type Definitions: From `src/types/forum.ts` (lines 149-165): ```typescript export type ReportReason = | 'spam' | 'harassment' | 'misinformation' | 'off_topic' | 'inappropriate' | 'other'; export interface ReportCreate { targetType: TargetType; targetId: string; reason: ReportReason; details?: string; } export interface Report { id: string; targetType: TargetType; targetId: string; reason: ReportReason; status: string; createdAt: string; } ``` #### Backend Implementation: Located in `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-api/app/routers/forum.py` (lines 1020-1066): - POST endpoint at `/forum/reports` - Validates `current_user` authentication - Prevents duplicate reports from same user - Creates `ForumReport` with status tracking - Checks for existing reports and throws error if already reported #### Issues: - **Frontend report button is non-functional** - no `onClick` handler or modal - **No report modal component** for user input - **Not wired to ForumContext** - no context method to submit reports - **No visual feedback** after reporting (success message, etc.) - **Comments cannot be reported** - only post reporting visible, but backend supports both `post` and `comment` types - **No auth guard** - unauthenticated users would get error attempting to report --- ### 4. **MISSING MORE OPTIONS MENU** **Status:** ‚ö†Ô∏è **PARTIALLY STUBBED** **Components:** - **PostCard** (`src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx`, line 91-93): ```tsx ``` - **Post Detail Page** - No more menu visible **Issues:** - Uses `MoreHorizontal` icon but has no menu - Could consolidate Share, Save, Report into this dropdown - `/src/types/forum.ts` - Type definitions for `ReportCreate`, `ReportReason` - `/src/contexts/ForumContext.tsx` - Missing report method **Backend:** - `/looksmaxx-api/app/routers/forum.py` - Report endpoints (POST `/forum/reports`, GET/PATCH for moderators) - Let me compile my findings: ## LOOKSMAXX Forum Share, Save, and Report Features Analysis Based on my comprehensive exploration of the LOOKSMAXX codebase, here's my detailed analysis of the forum's share, save, and report functionality: --- ### 1. **SHARE FUNCTIONALITY** **Status:** ‚ùå **NOT IMPLEMENTED** (UI present, no backend wiring) **Components:** - **PostCard** (`src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx`, line 83-86): ```tsx ``` - **Post Detail Page** (`src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx`, line 227-230): ```tsx ``` **Issues:** - Button exists but is non-functional (`onClick` handler missing) - No API method for sharing (not in `api.ts`) - No context method in `ForumContext.tsx` - No share modal or menu for options (copy link, social share, etc.) - Uses `Share2` icon from lucide-react but no implementation --- ### 2. **SAVE/BOOKMARK FUNCTIONALITY** **Status:** ‚ùå **NOT IMPLEMENTED** (UI present, no backend wiring) **Components:** - **PostCard** (`src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx`, line 87-90): ```tsx ``` - **Post Detail Page** (`src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx`, line 231-234): ```tsx ``` **Issues:** - Button exists but is non-functional (`onClick` handler missing) - No API method for saving/bookmarking (not in `api.ts`) - No context method in `ForumContext.tsx` - No saved posts list or collection page - No visual indication of saved/bookmarked status - Uses `Bookmark` icon but no state tracking **Missing Backend Support:** - No `ForumSave` or `ForumBookmark` database model - No `/forum/saves` or `/forum/bookmarks` endpoints - No save/unsave methods in API client --- ### 3. **REPORT FUNCTIONALITY** **Status:** ‚úÖ **PARTIALLY IMPLEMENTED** (Backend exists, frontend UI incomplete) **Components:** #### Frontend UI: - **Post Detail Page** (`src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx`, line 235-238): ```tsx ``` - Uses `Flag` icon from lucide-react - Button is non-functional (no `onClick` handler) #### API Method Exists: Located in `src/lib/api.ts` (lines 748-760): ```typescript async createForumReport(data: ReportCreate): Promise { const response = await this.request('/forum/reports', { method: 'POST', body: { target_type: data.targetType, target_id: data.targetId, reason: data.reason, details: data.details, }, }); return transformReport(response); } ``` #### Type Definitions: From `src/types/forum.ts` (lines 149-165): ```typescript export type ReportReason = | 'spam' | 'harassment' | 'misinformation' | 'off_topic' | 'inappropriate' | 'other'; export interface ReportCreate { targetType: TargetType; targetId: string; reason: ReportReason; details?: string; } export interface Report { id: string; targetType: TargetType; targetId: string; reason: ReportReason; status: string; createdAt: string; } ``` #### Backend Implementation: Located in `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-api/app/routers/forum.py` (lines 1020-1066): - POST endpoint at `/forum/reports` - Validates `current_user` authentication - Prevents duplicate reports from same user - Creates `ForumReport` with status tracking - Checks for existing reports and throws error if already reported #### Issues: - **Frontend report button is non-functional** - no `onClick` handler or modal - **No report modal component** for user input - **Not wired to ForumContext** - no context method to submit reports - **No visual feedback** after reporting (success message, etc.) - **Comments cannot be reported** - only post reporting visible, but backend supports both `post` and `comment` types - **No auth guard** - unauthenticated users would get error attempting to report --- ### 4. **MISSING MORE OPTIONS MENU** **Status:** ‚ö†Ô∏è **PARTIALLY STUBBED** **Components:** - **PostCard** (`src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx`, line 91-93): ```tsx ``` - **Post Detail Page** - No more menu visible **Issues:** - Uses `MoreHorizontal` icon but has no menu - Could consolidate Share, Save, Report into this dropdown - No modal or dropdown implementation --- ### 5. **COMPARISON MATRIX** | Feature | Frontend UI | API Method | Context Method | Modal/Dialog | Status | |---------|------------|-----------|----------------|-------------|--------| | **Share** | ‚úÖ Button exists | ‚ùå No API method | ‚ùå No context method | ‚ùå No modal | Not Implemented | | **Save/Bookmark** | ‚úÖ Button exists | ‚ùå No API method | ‚ùå No context method | ‚ùå No modal | Not Implemented | | **Report** | ‚úÖ Button exists | ‚úÖ API exists | ‚ùå No context method | ‚ùå No modal | Partially Implemented | | **Delete (Post Owner)** | ‚úÖ Button exists | ‚úÖ API exists | ‚úÖ deletePost() | ‚úÖ Confirmation | Fully Implemented | | **Edit (Post Owner)** | ‚ùå No button | ‚úÖ API exists | ‚úÖ updatePost() | ‚ùå No modal | Partially Implemented | --- ### 6. **KEY FILES INVOLVED** **Frontend:** - `/src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx` - Share/Save buttons in card view - `/src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx` - Share/Save/Report buttons in detail view - `/src/lib/api.ts` - API client with `createForumReport()` method - `/src/types/forum.ts` - Type definitions for `ReportCreate`, `ReportReason` - `/src/contexts/ForumContext.tsx` - Missing report method **Backend:** - `/looksmaxx-api/app/routers/forum.py` - Report endpoints (POST `/forum/reports`, GET/PATCH for moderators) - `/looksmaxx-api/app/models/forum.py` - `ForumReport` model with status tracking --- ### 7. **RECOMMENDED NEXT STEPS** **High Priority:** 1. Create `ReportModal.tsx` component with form for selecting reason and optional details 2. Add `reportPost()` method to `ForumContext.tsx` 3. Add analytics tracking for shares/saves/reports 3. Comment-level reporting (button + modal for individual comments) --- ### Summary The forum has **UI placeholders** for share, save, and report features, but only **report functionality is partially implemented on the backend**. The report API exists and is production-ready, but the frontend lacks a modal, context integration, and authentication checks. content.text:
**Forum Features Implemented:**

| Feature | Implementation |
|---------|----------------|
| **Share** | Copies post URL to clipboard, shows "Copied!" feedback with green styling |
| **Save** | Saves to localStorage, toggles icon/color (BookmarkCheck when saved) |
| **Report** | Full modal with 6 reasons (spam, harassment, misinformation, off_topic, inappropriate, other), optional details, wired to backend API |

**Files Modified:**
- `src/components/forum/PostCard.tsx` - Added handlers, state, dropdown menu
- `src/components/forum/ReportModal.tsx` - New component with glassmorphism UI
- `src/components/forum/index.ts` - Added ReportModal export
- `src/app/forum/post/[postId]/page.tsx` - Added handlers and modal

**Topics/Hashtags:** No removal needed - "topics" is just UI terminology for sub-forums, not a separate hashtag system.

Pushed to main ‚Üí Vercel deployment triggered. Test at https://looksmaxx-app.vercel.app/forum
